index-content.head_description: Document Metadata APIs native to C# .NET & Java. Read, write, edit & compare meta information of all popular formats. Analyze & export metadata.
index-content.title: Document Metadata Management Solution
index-content.description_0: APIs and apps to read, edit, replace and remove metadata of documents, images and other file formats on popular platforms.
index-content.description_1: Add hidden metadata information to your business files and documents.
index-content.description_2: Modify or remove metadata that already presented in your documents.
index-content.description_3: Collect and analyze information about documents & files metadata.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Have questions about our product? We have answers!

item_1.question: Does {{ProdShortName}} require third-party software for document metadata processing?
item_1.answer: {{ProdShortName}} operates independently; no external libraries like Microsoft Office or Adobe Acrobat are necessary.

item_2.question: Can I try out {{ProdShortName}} features before purchasing?
item_2.answer: Absolutely! {{ProdShortName}} offers a free trial. Install it and explore its capabilities. However, please note that trial versions add 'trial badges' to your documents, and only process the first 3 pages. For the complete experience, get a free 30-day temporary license for full functionality. Check out the details [here]({{LicensingUrl}}).

item_3.question: What types of licenses are available?
item_3.answer: Looking for a {{ProdShortName}} license? We've got you covered with various options. Choose from licenses tailored to your needs, based on factors like the number of developers on your team, deployment locations (e.g., single office or remote workplaces), and whether end-customer distribution requires sharing the SDK/API with clients. Alternatively, opt for a monthly usage license, where you pay based on your usage with metered plans. Explore further and find the perfect fit [here]({{PricingUrl}}).

index-content-net.head_title: {{EnvNameShort}} Metadata Reader, Viewer, Extractor, Remover & Exporter API
index-content-net.head_description: {{ProgLang}} {{EnvNameShort}} metadata API to read, write, edit, analyze, search, extract, remove, compare & export metadata of PDF Word Excel PPTX Outlook Audio Video & Images.
index-content-net.title: {{EnvNameShort}} API to Manage & Manipulate Metadata
index-content-net.description: Build {{EnvNameShort}} Applications to Read, Edit, Remove, Retrieve, Search, Compare, Replace and Export Metadata Information of all Popular Documents & Image File Formats.

overview_feature_1.title: {{ProgLang}} applications integration
overview_feature_1.description: {{ProdFullName}} API is easy to integrate with {{ProgLang}}, {{AspNet}} and other {{EnvNameShort}} based applications to help your end-users manipulate metadata from a range of images, documents and other media file formats without installing any external software. The {{EnvNameShort}} metadata library supports building tools to quickly add metadata viewer, editor, remover, extractor, comparison and exporter functionalities within a number of industry standard document formats such as PDF, Microsoft Office Word, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, Outlook emails, Project, Visio diagrams, OneNote, images, AutoCAD, Photoshop, audio, video and metafiles.

overview_feature_2.title: Various metadata types
overview_feature_2.description: The Metadata API is very flexible and easy to operate with. It gets the document file as input, analyses the metadata information, allows to perform supported meta data operations and save the modified file to access quickly in future use. It works with most notable metadata standards such as built-in, XMP, EXIF, IPTC, Image Resource Blocks, ID3 and custom metadata properties. Through {{ProdFullName}} API, you can also compare two documents to identify differences and similarities present in their metadata properties. You can also export metadata of required documents to Excel, CSV or DataSet.

overview_feature_3.title: All popular environments are supported
overview_feature_3.description: {{ProdFullName}} can be used to develop applications in any development environment that targets {{EnvNameShort}} platform. It is compatible with all {{EnvNameShort}} based languages and supports popular operating systems (Windows, Linux, MacOS) where {{Mono}} or {{EnvNameShort}} frameworks (including {{CoreNet}}) can be installed.

index-content-java.title: Metadata Manipulation API for {{EnvNameShort}}
index-content-java.description: Develop {{EnvNameShort}} Applications to Create, View, Access, Update, Delete, Search, Compare, Replace & Export Metadata of Popular Documents & Image Formats.
index-content-java.overview_description: Library designed for metadata manipulation via {{EnvNameShort}}

overview_feature_1.title: Control files & documents metadata
overview_feature_1.description: {{ProdFullName}} is an advanced metadata management API to manipulate metadata information of documents, images, archives, torrents and various other file formats. Developers can now enhance the functionality of their {{EnvNameShort}} applications by easily incorporating metadata viewing, modifying, deleting, extracting, searching, comparing, replacing and exporting features within all popular business document formats such as PDF, Microsoft Office Word, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations & slides, Outlook emails, Project, Visio diagrams, OneNote, images, AutoCAD, Photoshop, audio, video, OpenType fonts and metafiles.

overview_feature_2.title: Manipulate built-in metadata
overview_feature_2.description: The {{EnvNameShort}} metadata library offers you features such as metadata search, replace metadata properties, compare metadata of supported file formats to identify similarities as well as differences. You can also edit or modify metadata for better information management and export retrieved metadata information to Excel file, CSV file and DataSet. The API offers comprehensive support to work with all commonly used metadata standards like built-in, XMP, EXIF and custom metadata properties within supported document formats.

overview_feature_3.title: Broad Platform Support
overview_feature_3.description: {{ProdFullName}} is compatible with all {{EnvNameShort}} versions and supports popular operating systems (Windows, Linux, MacOS) that are capable to run {{EnvNameShort}} runtime.
